_description: Ywaine and Gawin — 4032 lines in couplets

BlCottGalEIX.First Lines:
Almyghty god [that made] mankynhe schilde [ ]aides out of syn
                    …
BlCottGalEIX.Last Lines: …to bide in if his wills beAmen Amen par charite
BlCottGalEIX.Note:
Transcript by J. W. Reed, 1777, in Oxford,  Bodleian Library Douce 65 (SC 21639), ff.
                        1-92v. Rubric heading f. 4ra by scribe, mostly
                    illegible due to Cotton fire damage.
BlCottGalEIX.Attributed Title:
Ywain and Gawayn þus makes endyng / God grant vs al hys dere blyssing
                    Amen (rubric on lines below last line, f. 25rb).

French,  Walter Hoyt,  and  Charles Brockway Hale.
